      • setPropertyFile

        public static void setPropertyFile(java.util.ResourceBundle propertyFile)

      • getDataRowCellsConfiguredValues

        public static void getDataRowCellsConfiguredValues(java.lang.String sheetItemString,
                                                   SheetDTO sheet,
                                                   java.lang.Integer totalCols)
        Get the configuration values for the data row cells
        Parameters:
        sheetItemString - String: Index of the sheet to process to recover properties value defined
        sheet - SheetDTO: DTO that represents the sheet with the configuration defined in the property file
        totalCols - Integer: Number of total columns to get value from a data row

      • getConcreteCellsConfiguredValues

        public static void getConcreteCellsConfiguredValues(java.lang.String sheetItemString,
                                                    SheetDTO sheet,
                                                    java.lang.Integer totalCells)
        Get the configuration values for the concrete cells
        Parameters:
        sheetItemString - String: Index of the sheet to process to recover properties value defined
        sheet - SheetDTO: DTO that represents the sheet with the configuration defined in the property file
        totalCells - Integer: Number of total concrete cells to get value from the sheet

      • getIntegerProperty

        public static java.lang.Integer getIntegerProperty(java.lang.String propertyToObtain,
                                                   java.lang.String sheet,
                                                   java.lang.String cell)
        This method obtain the specific Integer property value only for properties that not has dependence with other property
        Parameters:
        propertyToObtain - String: the String value of the property to obtain. This String is defined in TipoPropertiesExcelEnum.getPropertyValue
        sheet - String: In a text format, the number of the sheet in the property file (example, 0 for get information of sheet0 defined in the property file, 1 for sheet1...). Null if no need
        cell - String: In a text format, the number of the cell in the property file (example, 0 for get information of cell0 defined in the property file, 1 for cell1...). Null if no need
        Returns:
        Integer: In a number format, the value of the specific property

      • getStringProperty

        public static java.lang.String getStringProperty(java.lang.String propertyToObtain,
                                                 java.lang.String sheet,
                                                 java.lang.String cell)
        This method obtain the specific String property value only for properties that not has dependence with other property
        Parameters:
        propertyToObtain - String: the String value of the property to obtain. This String is defined in TipoPropertiesExcelEnum.getPropertyValue
        sheet - String: In a text format, the number of the sheet in the property file (example, 0 for get information of sheet0 defined in the property file, 1 for sheet1...). Null if no need
        cell - String: In a text format, the number of the cell in the property file (example, 0 for get information of cell0 defined in the property file, 1 for cell1...). Null if no need
        Returns:
        String: In a text format, the value of the specific property

      • getPropertyValue

        public static java.lang.String getPropertyValue(java.lang.String propertyToObtain,
                                                java.lang.String sheet,
                                                java.lang.String cell)
        Get the value from a configured property
        Parameters:
        propertyToObtain - String: the String value of the property to obtain. This String is defined in TipoPropertiesExcelEnum.getPropertyValue
        sheet - String: In a text format, the number of the sheet in the property file (example, 0 for get information of sheet0 defined in the property file, 1 for sheet1...). Null if no need
        cell - String: In a text format, the number of the cell in the property file (example, 0 for get information of cell0 defined in the property file, 1 for cell1...). Null if no need
        Returns:
        String: In a text format, the value of the specific property
